Widget.name: Pagination
Widget.Description: The pagination widget allows you to scroll into your result set.

Option.name: Pagination JSP template
Option.Description:
Specifies the Navigation header JSP template.
Change this if you do not want to use the original template.
Templates are located in /templates/.

Option.name: Number of pagination pages
Option.Description: Sets the number of pages to display in the pagination.

Option.name: More results link target
Option.Description: Specifies a link that will be displayed at the bottom of the result list to access more results.

Option.name: More results link label
Option.Description: Specifies the label of the More results link.

Option.name: Base path of the JSP templates
Option.Description: You can replace the relative path (default: templates/) by an absolute path like /WEB-INF/jsp/mydirectory/.
